translations: v.侵犯（与 on, upon 连用）；冒犯（与 against 连用, trespass 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 侵犯；非法侵入；妨碍；打扰

sentences.sentence: Trying to forgive my own real and imagined trespasses has been the hardest task.
sentences.translation: 努力宽宥自己切实的或是想象出来的罪过是最最艰难的任务。

sentences.sentence: And some versions of the Lord’s Prayer say “Forgive us our debts” rather than “Forgive us our trespasses”.
sentences.translation: 而在多个不同版本的主祷文“原谅我的罪过”中，罪过一词用的是“debts”而非“trespasses”。
